import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Header = () => { const [isDropdownOpen, setIsDropdownOpen] = useState(false); const toggleDropdown = () => { setIsDropdownOpen(!isDropdownOpen); }; const handleLinkClick = (sectionId) => { const element = document.getElementById(sectionId); element.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); setIsDropdownOpen(false); }; return (
Home
About Services Contact Me
{isDropdownOpen && (
handleLinkClick('about')} > About handleLinkClick('services')} > Services handleLinkClick('contact')} > Contact Me
)}
); }; export default Header;
